display_long_description:
Join free pixel-style adventure that combines **pet collecting, resource mining, horror chase, and pet training**. Experience thrilling monster hunts, discover mysterious pet eggs, mine rare resources, fight bosses, and raise powerful companions for intense pet battles! 

 📢 Join Discord: https://discord.gg/lavr (Lethal Animal vr)
# 🥚 Pet Raising – From Egg to Battle Partner
**Hatch** mysterious eggs at your base and watch your adorable pets grow! Each pet has **unique skills**—soaring aerial strikes, lightning-fast dodges, or big hits to beat tough Bosses. **Feed, train, and level up** your new friends to make them stronger for battle or just hangout and show off your rarest pets to everyone! [media]
# ⛏️ Mining Adventure – Gather & Upgrade
Go deep into dungeons to **mine** precious ores and rare loot. Use resources to **upgrade weapons and gear**: swing across gaps with a **grapple hook**, or eat **chili peppers** to breathe fire on enemies. Get stronger to survive the fast-paced chaos!
[media]
# 🏃‍♂️Horror Chase – Escape Monster & Find eggs !
Dash through mazes while scary monsters chase you! One wrong move and it's game over. Collect rare **pet eggs** hidden in dangerous areas— the scarier the place, the rarer the reward.[media]


# ⚔️ Pet PvP Battles
Test your pets in dangerous dungeons for rare loot, or enter **pet PvP arenas** against other players. Show off your ultimate training and dominate in real-time action brawls![media]
# ✨Key Features:
- Mining & Treasure Hunting
- PvP Brawls
- Tech Tree Unlocks
- Forge System
- Customization: Animal Avatars
